headline: Amcor and Berry Global merge to form packaging giant
summary: Amcor’s completed merger with Berry Global’s Consumer Packaging unit marks a significant consolidation in the global packaging industry.

raw.headline: Amcor and Berry Global merge to form packaging giant
raw.summary: Amcor’s completed merger with Berry Global’s Consumer Packaging unit marks a significant consolidation in the global packaging industry.

headline: Amcor cuts plastic use by 16% in Bulldog’s flexible tubes
summary: The reduction is expected to save around 8.5t of plastic per year.

raw.headline: Amcor cuts plastic use by 16% in Bulldog’s flexible tubes
raw.summary: The reduction is expected to save around 8.5t of plastic per year.
